content.html: If these people *actually* even believed Depp is the ‘victim’, why would they think it’s funny to dress their child up as a victim in an abuse case? Of course, it isn’t about Depp being a ‘victim’, it’s about misogyny towards Amber & wider sexual & domestic abuse survivors.
content.value:
If these people *actually* even believed Depp is the ‘victim’, why would they think it’s funny to dress their child up as a victim in an abuse case?

Of course, it isn’t about Depp being a ‘victim’, it’s about misogyny towards Amber & wider sexual & domestic abuse survivors.
